text: First week Lab #1 was done perfectly. I enjoyed the ideas and idea review from @FarzaTV and the @_buildspace team. It was a pleasure to be part of @_nightsweekends S5! I hope we will meet again after 6 weeks! https://t.co/27QogVLHZx
